title: Environment Events
description: Schema describing the JSON file structure for the environment configuration. It is is used to define which events are evaluated by the simulator. Entities entering the areas of the events, are notified by the 'EnvironmentSensorUpdates' interaction

event.title: event
event.description: Object to define a single event configuration.

location.description: The location of the event,, this can either be a geoArea or a string representing a specific road segment.

eventType.title: eventType
eventType.description: Object to define the type of an event.

sensorType.description: Represents the type of sensor value this event is emitting (e.g. Ice, Snow, or an arbitrary Obstacle). The value can be set to any valid string.

value.description: Used for assigning a value to the event. It can be used as the strength of an event, the amount of free parking spots in a parking lot, etc.

eventLocation.title: eventLocation
eventLocation.description: Object to define the event location configuration, which is either a GeoArea (e.g. rectangle, circle, or polygon) or a specific street segment.

area.description: The area in which the event is located in.

roadSegmentId.description: The ID of the road segment the event is located on (Connection ID or road ID).

area.title: area
area.description: Object to define the area in which the event is located in.

geoPoint.title: geoPoint
geoPoint.description: Object to define geographical point coordinates.

longitude.description: East-west position of a point on earth.

latitude.description: North-south position of a point on earth.

geoCircle.title: geoCircle
geoCircle.description: Object to define an immutable pair of a geoPoint center position and a radius in meters.

radius.description: Radius of the circle in m.

geoRectangle.title: geoRectangle
geoRectangle.description: Object to define an immutable pair of two different GeoPoints. Together they form a rectangular area.

a.description: GeoPoint defining the north-western vertex of the rectangle.

b.description: GeoPoint defining the south-eastern vertex of the rectangle.

geoPolygon.title: geoPolygon
geoPolygon.description: Object to define a set of GeoPoints. Together the points for a polygonal area.

vertices.description: Set of points representing the vertices of a polygon.

eventTime.title: eventTime
eventTime.description: Object to define the temporal properties of an event.

start.description: Start time of the event. If defined as a number, then the default unit is ns. Alternatively this can be defined as a string to include the unit of measurement (e.g. '3 minutes')

end.description: End time of the event. If defined as a number, then the default unit is ns. Alternatively this can be defined as a string to include the unit of measurement (e.g. '3 minutes')
